name: Truck Simulator Offroad 2
description:
Hello again dear drivers. Sz Interactive presents to you a new awesome truck simulator offroad 2.

Did you bored from classical cargo based truck game? This game is exatcly for you.

Emergency missions, natural disasters, human disasters and much more attractive event waiting for you.

Start your engine and help people! Do not stuck in the mud and release your monsters horse power to complete mission.

With Sz Interactive's improved physic engine you will feel the everything what is in your game.

Auto optimized and hd graphic will give you better performence and coolest graphic as your devices handle as possible.

Please feel free to leave a feedback and please report us if you find any bug in the game!

Now download the game and start your engine to the mountains!

Enjoy!
